title: NeuralNetworkConfiguration
description: A configuration file used in training neural networks.

VariableIndices.description: A collection of variable indices. Strings are treated as variable names and integers as numeric indices.

DataFormat.description: The overall format that the data should take.

DataType.description: The type of the data (ignoring binary IDs).

DataPreparation.description: Configuration parameters to prepare a dataset for use in training a neural network.

DataProperties.description: Intrinsic properties of the dataset that need to be known in order to prepare it.

ExampleIDVariable.description: The numeric index or name of the variable that is used to index the examples.

ExampleHeaderPresent.description: Whether the first row of the file containing the examples is a header.

Separator.description: The separator between variables in the input file.

TargetHeaderPresent.description: Whether the first row of the file containing the targets is a header.

DataSplit.description: How to split the dataset between train, test and validation sets.

NormaliseExamples.description: Configuration parameters for normalising a dataset.

NormaliseTargets.description: Configuration parameters for normalising a dataset.

ExamplesPerShard.description: The number of examples to save in each shard.

RandomSeed.description: The random seed to use to initialise the random number generators.
